name: Bamboudesign
tag_list: mobile-apps, ux-design, user-experience-design, usability, user-experience, design, iphone, smartphone, mobile-device, mobile-applications, mobile-web, user-test, visual-design, nui, natural-ser-interface, touchscreen, touch-screen, tactile-screen, gestur
overview:
Bamboudesign designs and develops smart consumer and enterprise mobile applications for iPhone, iPad, Android and other platforms, based on high-end user experience solutions. The company runs and hosts the iPhone Network Lounge, one of San Francisco’s largest Meetup network group of iPhone professionals. Bamboudesign is based in San Francisco.

Using a human-centered design methodology specific to mobile, the company builds applications from concept to delivery, meeting high-level usability, effectiveness and aesthetic standards. Founded in 2008, Bamboudesign audits, designs and develops applications for the entertainment, business, financial, beverage, software, and transportation industries.

<b>Mobile applications to date:</b>

  • Shaken Not Stirred for iPhone * Featured in iTunes’ What’s Hot * http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/shakennotstirred

Coming soon to the App Store:

  • Shaken Not Stirred (iPad)
  • Screening Party (iPhone)
  • My Nookie (iPhone)
  • Holiday Cocktail Bar (iPhone)
  • La Poste eCourrier (iPad)
  • iPhorex (iPhone)

A sample portfolio of more work can be downloaded here: www.bamboudesign.com/portfolio

milestones.description: Bamboudesign(TM) Mobile Application Design and Development Solutions Now Available for the iPhone, iPad, and Other Mobile Platforms
